resources.string: Body sensors permission is required to measure heart rate. Please grant the permission in the app settings.

This is a very simple Android app to measure your heart rate, using your phones heart rate sensor.\n\nI mainly made this app because I wanted to get readings from the sensor without using Samsung Health. It should work with all phones that have an integrated heart rate sensor like the Samsung Galaxy S7, S8, S9, S10 and probably more.
